page.title: 12 THE VALLEY GARDENS
page.content: I go to the Valley Gardens every day with my friends.I like it best in the winter going down off the top of the hills banging into one another.The bare trees with snow on the top,and people crying of cold.I put my sledge on the edge of the hill and push off. But in the summer it is just as good. The cafe shop is open and the paddling pool is alive with people jumping and splashing.Also in the summer I like to play tennis and crazy golf.But it is best to look at in the autumn.When all leaves are falling off the trees.They make a colourful carpet.I walk through them proudly.I stroll through the greeny pine woods.The needles shine as I look at the sun and watch it go down.
